[/quote]How are you hosting your highscores? On your computer, a VPS, a website hosting company, or what?[/quote]a computer with mysql[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2009, 02:33:55 pm[/size][hr]i have all the images, but im not sure how to add them to the page
